SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRODUCT LEFT JOIN STORE_DETAIL USING(PRODUCT_NO) LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_IMG USING(PRODUCT_NO) WHERE PRODUCT_CD = 1 AND PRODUCT_IMG_LEVEL = 0
AND STORE_TYPE=#{ct}

SELECT A.PRODUCT_NO,A.PRODUCT_NM,A.PRODUCT_PRICE, B.STORE_AMOUNT,B.STORE_MEMO,B.STORE_TYPE, NVL(C.DISCOUNT_PER, 0) DISCOUNT_PER, (E.PRODUCT_IMG_PATH || E.PRODUCT_IMG_NAME) STORE_IMG
, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "LIKE" D WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND D.PRODUCT_NO = A.PRODUCT_NO) LIKEIT
FROM PRODUCT A LEFT JOIN STORE_DETAIL B ON A.PRODUCT_NO = B.PRODUCT_NO LEFT JOIN DISCOUNT C ON A.PRODUCT_NO = C.PRODUCT_NO JOIN PRODUCT_IMG E ON A.PRODUCT_NO = E.PRODUCT_NO WHERE PRODUCT_CD= 1 AND PRODUCT_IMG_LEVEL = 0
AND STORE_TYPE=#{ct}
ORDER BY 1 DESC ORDER BY PRODUCT_PRICE*(100-DISCOUNT_PER)/100 ORDER BY PRODUCT_PRICE*(100-DISCOUNT_PER)/100 DESC
ORDER BY LIKEIT DESC
SELECT PRODUCT_IMG_PATH||PRODUCT_IMG_NAME STORE_IMG, PRODUCT_IMG_LEVEL FROM PRODUCT_IMG WHERE PRODUCT_NO = #{no}
SELECT PRODUCT_NO,PRODUCT_NM,PRODUCT_PRICE,STORE_AMOUNT FROM PRODUCT LEFT JOIN STORE_DETAIL USING(PRODUCT_NO) WHERE PRODUCT_NO IN (1348,1350,1351)
